item.description:
FRI 4/12 JEFF PEVAR AND MATT ZEINER!!   PLEASE  ARRIVE BY 8:30 PM TO SAVE YOUR SEAT.

JOIN US FOR ANOTHER GREAT NIGHT OF MUSIC AND ENTERTAINMENT! JEFF PEVAR, MATT ZEINER, DAVE LIVOLSI, MARTY RICHARDS AND *SPECIAL GUESTS*! WE WON'T GIVE IT AWAY, YOU HAVE TO COME DOWN AND SEE FOR YOURSELF!! $10 COVER CHARGE AT THE DOOR..this is a bargain since you can see them in concert for much more.  Our table reservation is all set.  You can come as early as 8:00 pm for dinner, but please be there at least by 8:30pm.  Ask for reservation for Judi.  Can't wait to enjoy this evening with you all.
item.how_to_find_us: I will reserve a table - call cell 203-915-6766 or 860-561-4060

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: An Evening of Dining and Dancing at the Old Well Tavern
